content.detailedDescription: I'm not sure of the time but i was headed home from a hike and i was looking at the northern lights when a bunch of starlike lights moving in sequence caught my attention then i saw an airplane flying and when it flew towards the lights it went from out of sight until it reached the other side and there was no cloud that night so it had me puzzled to what i saw. so i continue my walk home as i suddenly i saw something bright flash and i looked up then i saw it again and it happend one more time and i got a little nervous so i went to call a cab and my phone started acting up then all of a sudden it went to normal and i finally got a cab and went home
content.summary: clear night.Unknown amount of starlike lights heading together when i say a plane in the distance when it passionately the plane had vanish from sight until it passed

content.detailedDescription: Hello, my name is michael reardon. i'm currently a student at slippery rock university double majoring in physics/mechanical engineering, and this is my ufo story. let me start off by saying: i usually try to rationalize things before i come to conclusions, but i can tell you that this wasn't ball lighting, dust particles, or bugs. i was doing my statics homework at 10:20-10:27pm saturday september 18th when suddenly i notoced a bright dot out of the corner of my eye followed by my neighbors dog barking like crazy. upon noticing these things, i then turned towards the window and saw a very bright, basketball sized, white/silver, beautifully uniquely shaped ufo (orb). this orb was like nothing ive ever seen or experienced before. the best way i can describe it is somewhat angelic. it's shape was mainly spherical, but looked like it was a spherical shape hard to comprehend(like a two dimensional creature seeing a 3 dimensional sphere). it's almost like it came from a higher dimensional plane, managed to somehow project to our plane, gave off a feeling of power and love, and was accompanied by a light humming sound. i hypothesize that  mathematically, this type of "dimensional projection" can be explained by mapping from a 4 dimensional vector plane(their reality) onto a 3 dimensional vector plane(our reality) (linear algebra transformations). this would allow an orb of possibly a higher dimension to travel to lower dimensions and be visible to us 3 dimensional creatures. the orb's travel path was linear, traveling from the woods (behind the back parking lot of my building) to a lamp post (in the back parking lot). while traveling, it was pulsating. again, i was absolutely astonished by this object. the duration of time it took the orb to travel from the woods to the lamp post was approximately 1 minute. when the orb neared the light post, it caused the lights to dim initially. when the lights brightened, the orb started to almost "dance" around them in some sort of way. the object appeared to be metallic and have some sort of electric and magnetic field around it. with that being said, it's almost like the orb was trying to "charge" itself by interacting it's magnetic field against the electric field emitted by the light (this is explained by the solinoid-coil experiment to create a charge). as the orb did this it started to brighten. after staring at this orb baffled, confused, and coming to the realization that i wasn't seeing things, i took out my phone and started recording it. after a couple seconds of recording i waved my hands to try to get it's attention. upon seeing me, the orb started to zigzag from one point in space to another instantly (null geodesic) and then suddenly vanished instantly. also, the object appears to disappear traveling to the left. i submitted the original unedited video i took below so if you want to see how the object actually takes off, slow down the time frames in the video at the time gap from 32s- 36s. thank you very much for taking the time to read this and watch the video. and as a junior physics and engineering student i ensure the accuracy of the theory and invite you to look into the physics/mathematical topics after watching the video to try to make sense of these ufos and their nature. hope to hear back from you soon. it's time to prove these things exist once and for all.
content.summary: Circular/square (shape was like a square and circle put together), basketball sized, extremely  animated(from a higher existing plane)

content.detailedDescription: Night of a full moon, noticed another bright moving light in the sky which appeared to be a helicopter with a search light, but moved in an unusual curvilinear path.  watched the craft move at varying altitudes and speeds.  seemed to be searching for something on the ground.  seen from a distance of approximately 2 miles away, the craft primarily remained above corn and soybean fields.  lights on the bottom of the craft changed colors from a yellowish hue to white and then to blueishlike color.  after several minutes, the lights turned off and the craft disappeared as it seemed to raise in altitude at a high rate of speed.
content.summary: Hovering lights above cornfield

content.detailedDescription: I have an alien... i think still alive though in several bags in freezer. causes laughter like your dying.... just figured out... pic below.
content.summary: Took off sandal and it was under foot as i stepped down.

content.detailedDescription: It hovered for more than 15 minutes and then shot off into the air.
content.summary: Huge ufo over old power plant

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us were in our backyard having a bonfire. our 14 year old daughter was pointing out constellations when she come upon moving objects. she pointed them out to myself and my husband. when i fist looked in the direction i immediately noticed the flashing airplanes but next seeing what she was pointing at. the strangest sky occurrence we've seen. a large mass of many solid lights in the sky all moving together at the same speed in what appeared to be a diagonal line then a shorter diagonal like a v, there were to many lights to count. we immediately starting to illuminate options of what it could be.  there was no flame, no tail, no stream. they were not colored, they did not flash. we saw several planes in the sky that appeared (from ground)  to be flying through the moving objects but at a different altitude. 
how could so many stars fall at same time? could it be warfare? could it be meteor showers? 

after running in the house to get the other three kids to see the event, they immediately reacted and were scared and upset while the other three of us were still in awe at the unique event we were witnessing. be tried to get video and pictures but it was to far away for an iphone camera. eventually the lite mass traveled to far for us see or went into the clouds as they slowly faded away. 

following i got my laptop and started searching different events photos to see which image looked simalar which eliminated all of our previous thoughts and questions and landed on potential ufo sights. i got goosebumps looking at photos exactly like we saw except we saw many more lights.

lights were moving from sw to se. 

did anyone else see this? 

later we kept looking and saw the satellite c2278 rocket moving from n to s. name appeared on our star app.
content.summary: Mass of a solid lights (30-50) traveling in diagonal or v pattern from sw to se

content.detailedDescription:
While walking back to my campsite at the eaa airventure aviation convention, i noticed an unwavering, solid orange light moving quickly across the sky from my right to my left, west to east, traveling right overhead. i am a student pilot and aviation enthusiast, and am quite familiar with the appearance of aircraft flying at night; as such, it struck me as very strange that there were no red and green navigation lights, and no blinking strobe. furthermore, the airventure convention shuts down flight operations after dark (except for certain scheduled aircraft arrivals).

my immediate thought was that it was an r/c aircraft or quadcopter, but it was silent, and seemed to be flying too high and too fast. i would estimate the light altitude at approximately 1,800 feet. the light travelled in a straight line at a constant velocity. i watched it for about one minute, then i pulled out my cell phone and filmed it for 16 seconds. it was becoming hard to track with the screen of my phone, so i continued to watch with just my eyes until finally losing track of the light. i tried to find it again, but i believe i lost it due to distance. the sighting lasted approximately two minutes, and during this time the light never flickered or changed intensity/color.

i was quite mystified after watching the light, certain in my belief that it was not a legal/registered flight but uncertain as to what was flying. this is the only flying object that i have seen in my life that i have not been able to identify.
content.summary: Unwavering orange orb of light travelled rapidly across the sky in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: During a break at work, i noticed an object hovering above a nearby tree. after approximately 15-20 seconds of observation, i pulled out my phone and started recording. i knew that what i was seeing was unidentifiable to me. the object looked very fuzzy at times and nearly transparent, other times it looked like a large white bag that was filled about 75% and slowly tumbling in the air. the object appeared to pulse light on its surface or reflect flashes of sunlight. the top of the tree in the video is about 125-150 feet from my position.
content.summary: Noticed orb like object hovering above a tree.

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i posted something a few days ago and i now regret not posting that at the time that it actually occured, as now i get to post yet another and it seems a bit odd that i keep getting these things in my photos.

i did not see this with my naked eye. i was jogging and them stopping to catch the great sunset. later i see this thing, in the photos. upon further inspection, there appears later in the series a different object,far off and travelling fast.

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? jogging before dinner.
2. what made you first notice the object? looking at the photos after dinner and a shower.
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? it's weird, i have no idea. i do know that it was not dark enough to get refrctions from head lights.
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. please look at the series. i have provided the original shots along with crops.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. i one way, cranky. i wih i saw it with my eyes. other than that, amazed. why do i keep getting these in my photos?
6. how did you lose sight of the object? i finished my walk/jog.


i can only attach 10 of 51 in the series. not every shot has something in it but it shows movement of the object. i need a investigater to send me an e-mail address so i can send the rest.

aloha, thanks. 


'i, (see above), understand that by posting my pictures, audio, or video (media) files to this website, i am granting to mufon (the mutual ufo network), its agents, employees, and assigns, the permission to the same or any part of said media for any purpose mufon deems necessary and/or appropriate, including, but not limited to, the following: (1) television broadcast; (2) radio broadcast; (3) internet broadcast and/or distribution; (4) press releases; (5) website use or promotion; (6) photo of the week; (7) print media; and, (8) any other lawful use of said media which mufon sees fit. i hereby waive and release any claims or actions against mufon for use of said media and agree to hold mufon harmless for any injury or harm resulting or arising from any use by mufon of said media. i further certify that i am the author/owner of the submitted media and that i am 18 years of age or older.'
content.summary: Before dinner walk/jog. i take photo of the sunset if it's nice. i got a surprise.

content.detailedDescription: Trumpet
content.summary: Violent

content.detailedDescription: I took a picture, and saw the anomalies in the picture. that is all. why so much detail to try to send you a damn picture?
content.summary: 5 orb like spheres hovering above ocean so i took a picture that caught all 5.

content.detailedDescription:
I am making a first report of of a friends story as told he told it to me. he let  me know it would be okay for me to relate this story for him. 
he advised that he was about 12 years old at the time. he was playing basketball outside of his house, when something made him look up and he saw a dark silver colored ufo, saucer shape about 30 ft above him. he told me that he was terrified and dropped the ball and ran in the house. he told his mother about this, and they both went outside. it was gone. he continued to tell me that both his father and his grandfather have seen ufo's and have also been abducted. he let me know that his grandfather had kept a journal on his abductions, and that he was working on getting these from his father, as his grandfather has passed. it kinda sounds like maybe a family type situation? i asked him if he wanted to tell someone about it? he said yes, and that he didn't know really how to find the right person. i attempted to make a report of this before, but i think i did it in the wrong area. would be great if i could help him get to talk to someone maybe with mufon, and get his whole story out. i think this might be a pretty interesting case. anyway, please feel free to contact me, at my cel phone would be best, and i will get the investigator in contact with my friend. thanks so much for your time, and i hope to hear back! 
rick m.
content.summary: A friend observed the object and told me about it. he advised that he was playing basketball outside by himself at the time. was daylight when this occured. he said something made him look upward and he said that he saw the craft hovering above him.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the dogs like i always do about 9:45. i always scan the sky's when i'm out at night because i like spotting space junk. as i looked to the north there was a bright star that i didn't see the night before and while looking at it, it just vanished. i kept watching the area it was in and nothing showed up, no shadow, nothing. i thought maybe it was a meteor coming straight at me but it didn't have an orange, glow it was blue/white just like a star. the night was clear. i've never seen a star just go out like that. there's something going on in our sky's and you can bet your booty i'll be watching.
content.summary: A bright star that just vanished.

content.detailedDescription: On august 18, 2016, at 20:48, myself, my mom and sister were at white sands national monument. the monument was opening late that night for a special full moon event complete with military band at the dunes.  prior to the event we were all sledding on the dunes.  i decided to do a selfie video on my iphone 6s, while sliding down the dunes.  after leaving later that night, headed to silver city, nm, i was viewing the video, and noticed a silvery, metallic, somewhat round object that seemed to flip around in the sky above me.  it appeared to dart around somewhat but that could also be from me being in motion sliding down the dunes.  we tried to debunk as a sunspot, but near the end of the video i could see a sunspot and it is not the same as what i captured in the video.  at first not sure, but when viewed in slow motion it is very visible.  i also snapped still shots from the video which show something and it doesn't appear to be a cloud or a sunspot, but something with mass and shape.  to my knowledge there was no aerial testing going on at the missile range that day, as the roads were still open and the monument was open, which both are normally closed during testing.
content.summary: Metallic, reflective type semi circular object flipping around in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Walking home from the store on friday evening, looked up to the sky and saw an elongated diamond shape, glowing as bright as the sun (but quite a bit smaller(, but about the size of an aeroplane from the ground...

travelling from right to left of my perspective (i was looking roughly ne)

took out my phone to film, as i was videoing, it struggled to focus, then my phone showed a black screen, crashed, re-started and it hadn't even saved what i had filmed up to that point, it was totally gone! - could be co-incidence, but i thought i'd add it!
content.summary: Elongated diamond, glowing bright like the sun, but about the size of an aeroplane from the ground

content.detailedDescription: I was in back yard i thought they were ufo very bright they disappeared in the far north i think they were high & the sun reflected of them
content.summary: Over 15 on the same path a cluster of about 7 & the rest followed randomly over 15 min

content.detailedDescription:
Standing outside the rear entrance (bus station entrance) of silverburn shopping centre. observed a single light/orb fly from west to east over the shopping centre. there was no sound or other normal landing lights or light sources visible near/on or eminating from the object. 

i immediately thought this was unusual and started to pay close attention.

i then looked westt again and spotted three more orange lights/orbs flying in a triangular formation several hundred meters behind the first orb.  same direction of flight under control, no noise or other light sources around or emminating from the the objects.

this first group were then followed by another group of three lights/orbs flying several hundred meters behind and these displayed the exact same characteristics as the first group. 

finally a single light/orb was at the rear flying as above, and about several hundred meters behind. 

the eight passed over the shopping centre and out of my field of view to the east

they were flying at approx the speed of a light aircraft or slower.

i attempted to capture this on video with my iphone but the lights/orbs cannot be seen. 

my partner observed the objects as did another couple nearby who thought it was "really weird"

i am ex military level headed and also hold a civil aviation authority license and always thought that most of ufo sightings were of know/natural events. however this sighting convinced me that what i observed  was not any normal planes/helicopters/drones/birds or chinese lanterns passing overhead.
content.summary: Eight orange orbs flying in formation over silverburn shopping centre.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in bed. bedroom window, shutters and curtains left open. i had difficulty to fall asleep for some time. after a while though i almost was about to fall asleep when i suddenly felt the strong urge to open my eyes: and there they were: 4 orange-yellow-golden glowing orbs hovering above the lake of zurich!

i jumped up and rushed to my bedroom window. what i saw was very unusual. the lights were about one kilometer away from me. but they were so big, that they were very clearly visible. no trees or other buildings were obstructing the view on to those orbs since our house is on top of the hill and has a full view over the entire lake of zurich.

i immediately compared the lights with the lights of houses or streetlights on the other side of the lake. the lights of the 4 orbs were much more bigger than any normally visible light from the other side of the lake. and a lot brighter.

next i thought about whether or not these could be helicopters or drones. the 4 orbs were moving from west to east about in the middle of the lake and at a hight of about 200 to 400 meters above the surface of the lake. the orbs seemed to fly in a loose formation. meaning: same direction but not directly in parallel. all 4 orbs were on the different flight level - and seemed to move a bit back and forth (maybe could be described as slightly zic-zac-ing back and forth - but yet all 4 orbs were moving from west to east. the speed of the movement could have been the speed of a helicopter - but the typical lightings of helicopters were missing. i am talking of the position-lightings of planes or helicopters. instead the entire object was glowing in an orange-yellow-golden-fire-like color. also there were no sounds. 4 helicopters fyling in formation in the middle of the night over an open area of a lake would have been making at least some noise - even from the distance i was observing.

after about 2-3 minutes one orb after the other just faded out... just disappeared... but not like switching the light off and gone it was - it was more like a slow "fading out of the light" over a few seonds for each of the orbs... 

only then i even thought about the fact that i could have rushed to get my iphone and make pictures - but somehow i did not even think of that during the event. i was too fascinated. then i looked at the watch and it was 00:24 in the middle of the night. so i would guess the time span during which i was making these observation was about 00:20 to 00:24. 

after this i was wide awake and puming adrenalin because i realized that i had really seen something very very unusual... :-)
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orbs were flying / hovering over the lake of zurich

content.detailedDescription: I was at stonewall resort, me and three others were heading to the top of the hill to get our machinery out for the morning job. it was pretty dark out still so we sat there waiting for it to get a bit brighter out so we could see what we are doing. i happened to look up at the stars like i do sometimes. i noticed a bright light moving in the sky, i pointed it out asking what the heck it was, one of our guys said it's just a airplane. i disagreed, airplanes have different lights. at the time it just looked like a solid light moving in a straight direction but shifting side to side as well. i grabbed my phone and zoomed in as close as i could to get a video, my phone goes zoomed up to 4x but it's a cheap android so the quality was bad. i decided to take a photo as well. there was another one some distance away you can see it in the photo. we just let it be and went back to work since the sun was coming up and this wasn't my first ufo encounter. when i went home and i zoomed in on that photo i was shocked. i showed my girlfriend as well, what was a single light was actually four lights in a triangle shape. the way they are facing doesn't match the direction it moves.
content.summary: Saw flying in dark sky, lights not usual.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from taos to santa fe on 9/17/16 and to my right in the sky was a very large bright light that did not move for over an hour much larger than a star and very bright. at sunset it turned redish and dissapeared. it did not look like a weather balloon. some drivers pulled over and took pictures.
content.summary: There was a stationary large bright light for over an hour between taos and santa fe that was much larger than a star

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out front of my house after turning my front lights on in order to help our halloween blow-up cat inflate without getting stuck on a bush, (huge halloween fans, always decorate early). as i was holding the thing, something in the corner of my eye caught my attention. i looked up in the sky when i saw a large, bright orb with a golden glow to it. it appeared to be as far as the stars, yet as bright as a planet such as jupiter or venus, which i initially thought it was. after watching it hover there completely still for a second, the bottom and top of it started to sorta flicker and then brighten. while doing so, there was what i can only describe as a spectrum burst through the middle of it. (all colors of the spectrum circled the orb for a split second.) it then moved to the left a few feet, (from my pov, probably hundreds of feet in actuality) and completely vanished; it didn't dim into a faint light that slowly or quickly drifted off that i was still able to trace. it didn't take off at a fast speed. it just completely vanished and look almost misty while doing so. no sounds whatsoever. nothing else.
content.summary: Huge orb like u.F.O. brightens with color before completely vanishing.

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday i was in a parking lot around 8pm in santo andre - sao paulo - brazil and there it was: a beautiful full moon, huge and clear. so, before i entered my car, i decided to take a picture of the moon. i took my nokia lumia 1020 (41mp camera) and adjusted iso to 4000 and took 2 photos. in the first one, there was this object - not visible with the naked eye: huge, white, with a kind of different texture borderline, almost like an spiral. in the second picture it was simply not there. not sure what it was, but it really intrigued me. if anyone can, please, take a look and tell me if this is possible in a photo, i would really appreciate it. thank you.
content.summary: Strange object appeared in a sequence of photos. it was only visible in the photo.

content.detailedDescription: Grand forks alberta. husband took a video of my sister climbing a tree. he recorded using a slow mode feature for comic reasons. after watching the video afterward, a black disk could be clearly seen moving swiftly across the sky.  it's reasonable to conclude that in 'real time' this disk must have been moving extremely fast! hence, the reason we did not see it while we were recording my sister.
content.summary: Video taken in slow mode. disk flew swiftly across sky

content.detailedDescription: I am an avid believer in ancient astronaut theoryou. i had just gotten out of the shower when i was reading facebook posts about the strange light in the sky everyone in the area was talking about it.Fearful that i had missed my once in a lifetime opportunity to see a ufo i ran outside and low and behold there it was a stationary orb i witnessed it change colors from blue to white to red to orange in disbelief i called my husband at work so he could tell me that what i was seeing was real he confirmed it was. local news is now posting on their local news feed that it was a weather balloon and if we wanted to track the flight path we could do so by clicking on link provided so i did not to my surprise the "path" recorded on the "weather balloon" was no where near northern new mexico and i know for a fact i don't have super natural eyesight or xray vision. once again they are blaming a weather balloon come on new mexico are we really going to buy that story again don't let this be another roswell let's believe in the obvious and the proof
content.summary: There were multiple witness orb that changed colors while stationary newso is saying it's a weather ballon but when i checked the path of the supposed ballon that was tracked on a map it was no where near northern new mexico

content.detailedDescription: I just pulled my car into the drive way a little after midnight last night, when i was locking my car i heard what sounded like a airplane, living by an airport i know that no flights came in so late. so i stood in my driveway to see what kind of airplane it was. suddenly i see a white orb of light going over the roof tops and over the trees. not far behind were 3 black helicopters in a triangle shaped flight pattern following the craft at very high speeds. the craft then made a left hand turn twords the mountains, that's when i see on of the helicopters intercept the craft, getting in front of it, that's when i loose sight of the craft over the roofs of near by houses. but i still stood to listen to the helicopters to see if they are still in the area. i know that this wasn't an airplane or helicopter due to the fact that it had no blinking lights or defined shape, and made no sound at all. when i took my cell phone out to record video the sky was too dark. before hand my cell phone was around 20% about a minute or two before i saw the craft. but when i took it out to try and record the video i noticed my battery life was on 2%. i'm a very open minded person, i've seen 3 ufos in my life time 2 over this summer, so when i first saw the craft i looked to see a defined shape or lights which i seen nether.  i know it was something starange when t saw the 3 black helicopters following. i could easily see the shape of the helicopters because of how clear of a night it was was. i felt curious and wanted to follow the craft but i know no one would believe me, that is why i reported it to mufon.
content.summary: White orb chased by 3 black helicopters.

content.detailedDescription: The event happened last year, the night before halloween. it was about 11:15 at night. i had just gotten home from work. i got out of my car and went around to the passenger side to get my bags out. right before i grabbed the handle, i heard what sounded like a big gust of wind approaching. i turned around to look at the tops of the trees on the hill across from the parking lot. nothing was moving. i stared and waited. then a warbling sound (like sheet metal being moved) mixed in with the wind sound. i still stared. then, i realized that the sound was now above the trees, but yet i couldn't see a thing. where this craft was, i could see the stars in the sky twinkling. then, extremely quickly, it was hovering right above me, very close, about 6 to 8 feet above me. the warbling sound stopped by now. i could hear what sounded like air moving extremely fast around it. it was moving from top to bottom, too to bottom, not from side to the other side. still, i could see nothing. it moved up, then back down to exactly where it was, then up, back, then up and....Gone. just gone. i will never forget that. it all happened pretty quickly. i was never scared. i'm not sure why. i think it might be because my mind was going a million miles a minute trying to make sense of what was going on....Why i couldn't see this thing. anyhow, i went inside and immediately checked the clock. 11:20. no time lost. so i don't believe i was taken anywhere. by the way, the spot in the trees where it was at...There are power lines that run through there.  there were no lights that i could observe. nothing but sound. it was incredible.
content.summary: Transparent ufo encounter near woods

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the gulf shores state park pier on august 7th photographing the city lights and trying to freeze lightning images with my camera. i first observed a single red orange orb coming up over the city, then another and finally a third. then i noticed they formed a triangle over the city as i gazed west. they sat there for 5 minutes and then assented back over the city horizon line. during this time i noticed the water below the pier had gotten lighter but i kept looking back at the orbs while taking several shots of this phenomenon. when i got the shots back to the hotel i looked at image 2967 and noticed that something indeed had lit up the water below the pier. it was some strange creature or object that shot water out the back end of it. the water shoots out in spurts and looks to almost defy gravity. with 3 orbs in the sky and something large shooting water out the back it was a strange photograph indeed. i did not hear it shooting the water out because i was at or near the point on the pier that the waves break under the pier. looking at the photo it's clear this was no blow hole from a whale. so there were 2 unexplainable objects in this image.According to my exif data shortly after this thing swan by me going from my left to right the orbs started their assent back to the west over the city. shortly after that i packed up my camera and tripod and went back to the hotel.I am only submitting this one image but have several images of the orbs and 5 or 6 on the object swimming by the pier.
number of objects observed is 4. three in the sky and one in the water.
total number of witnesses i put at 2. a gal stopped by to see if i was getting any lightning shots and i said yes but what was more interesting were those 3 lights hovering over gulf shores. she looked and noticed them also. we talked a little more and she left without giving her name.
content.summary: Standing on the gulf shores pier i observed 2 unknown phenomenon.First it was 3 orbs over the city in formed a triangle then something floated by shooting water out the back end next to the pier. have photographs.

content.detailedDescription: It was just before sunset and i was in my room when a roommate told me to look out my western windows to see a stationary, small, round, ball of light which seemed to be right above santa fe (nm).  it was not moving at all.  i went outside to get a better view.  it was much too large to be a star or planet(venus). it appeared to be perfectly round and about the size of a christmas mini light from my vantage point (+/- 1/8th inch). it changed color from bright white to orange red as the sun set.  i assumed it reflected the setting sun.  it then got smaller until it disappeared while not changing its position in the sky.  the sky was completely clear with perfect visibility.  this happened before the sky got dark on sept. 17, 2016 from 7:30 - 7:45 pm.
content.summary: Observed a round,white, bright object hovering above santa fe, nm at sunset 09/17/16.  it was stationary and slowly got smaller until it disappeared before getting dark..

content.detailedDescription: Albuquerque, nm; 1907 hrs (just sunset); driving.  only light in the pale blue evening sky.  unmoving, absolutely still.  i knew it wasn't a star, it was too bright, too big, and it was the only light in the sky.  i knew it wasn't the space station or other satellite, it was way too big and it did not move at all.  i initially thought it was a balloon (balloon fiesta time in abq), but immediately discounted the idea of a hot air balloon, it was way too bright and too stationary.  it didn't move a degree in any direction for about 45 minutes and was incredibly bright, even in the twilight.  it was about half the width of an aspirin, if held at arm's length.  i could be a high-altitude instrumentation balloon. if so, it was incredibly big.  if a weather balloon, it was very high.  balloons move with air currents and they rise.  this 'object' did neither.  i just checked and the light was gone while i was writing this report, ~1945.  but it is well dark and a reflective object would have passed into the earth's shadow.  not really a believer in 'ufos,' but it was really kind of odd.  i think i was really struck by its immobility.
content.summary: Bright reflective object at sundown

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for the train --61 st woodside, 7 train-- then i walked towards the end of the platform. unfortunately, no one else was close. i  noticed a single light from far away. the light was too "big" to be a star and too high in the sky to be a lamp post, it was just hovering there, motionless. at first i thought it was a helicopter, until i heard the train coming and turned around ready to leave. i took my phone out to take a picture but, the ufo was not a single light anymore but three. i felt confused and astonished. i got on the train and managed to take a picture. *i'm kind of skeptic about ufos and aliens but this event has rendered this topic more interesting. it took me a while to discover this organization but hope to find a reasonable explanation.*
content.summary: Waiting for train. walked towards end of station. noticed light. turned around to check on train. three lights.
